memories.title: Sedona Christmas
memories.body: Had our first adventure with just the two of us, in Sedona AZ. We hiked Bear Mountain and also checked out some of the energy vortex hikes!

memories.title: Valley of Fire
memories.body: First day of the new year we hiked at Valley of Fire State Park in Nevada, about an hour away from Vegas. We hiked with our friend John. We did some scrambling and off trail hiking, and saw some goats high up on some cliffs!

memories.title: Death Valley
memories.body: Explored many unique locations including the Dunes and the Devil's Racetrack! Ran the Suby through the ringer on hours of washboard roads deep in the middle of nowhere!

memories.title: Joshua Tree
memories.body: Hiked Ryan Mountain and did some scrambling in the Hall of Horrors! Visited the Moorten Botanical Gardens!

memories.title: Winona MN
memories.body: Did ice climbing for the first time! Also celebrated Cowgirl's birthday with the VE crew up there!

memories.title: Great Sand Dunes
memories.body: Braved a sandstorm and cold weather to hike up the dunes surrounded by the snow covered 14ers!

memories.title: Red River Gorge KY
memories.body: Rented a cute cabin and climbed for several days on the beautiful sandstone!

memories.title: San Antonio TX
memories.body: Visited the Alamo and one of our favorite botanic gardens so far, the San Antonio Botanic garden!

memories.title: Monument Valley
memories.body: Morning horseback ride with cowgirl among the beautiful rock formations!
